alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:17PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Dallas and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 41.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 70.1 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
